item.description:

item.source: Best ever FPS Remade with awesome graphics coming out next week!

item.title: Best ever FPS Remade with awesome graphics coming out next week!
item.dc:creator: Neon_Impulse
item.description:
Ashe:

Generic shootan game not best FPS ever.

it’s more than a ‘‘Generic shootan game’’. It’s a colorful, Imaginative Sci-fi shooter with not-so-subtle jokes and references to loads of things. (e.g Duke nukem, Retro games, Sex, game developing and just everything!)

Serious Sam > Duke nukem

Halflife = Serious sam

in different ways IMO. Half-life is an atmospheric, Realistic (Well, Compared to serious sam :lol: ) and puzzling title that relies on storytelling and interesting plot developments (which are abundant :awesome: )

Serious Sam is a fun, random and just downright silly title that relies and interesting weapons/enemies/locations/ etc.

Read full topic
